description: Inventory management games are becoming another popular thing at the moment. We've had all those survivor-like bullet-heaven games and now another genre is springing to life. NEODUEL: Backpack Monsters looks like a sweet spin on the idea.
title: NEODUEL: Backpack Monsters blends an inventory PvP auto-battler with a monster-fusing twist

description: Zelda 64: Recompiled was pretty interesting news recently, a PC port of Nintendo's The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask using the new N64: Recompiled tool and now a fresh update is out to improve it further.
title: Zelda 64: Recompiled, the Majora's Mask PC port v1.1 brings various upgrades

description: VoxeLibre (formerly MineClone2), a free and open source sandbox game, has a brand new release available as they begin more movement to end the Minecraft clone wars.
title: VoxeLibre (formerly MineClone2) v0.87 released moving away from Minecraft

description: Terraria the smash-hit indie game is being turned into a tabletop experience with Terraria: The Board Game. It's crowdfunding on Kickstarter, and obviously it was going to do well.
title: Terraria: The Board Game live on Kickstarter - goal met almost instantly

description: Sonar Shock looks a bit System Shock-like and that's a great thing, as it was inspired by various immersive RPGs from the 90s.
title: Inspired by immersive RPGs from the 90s Sonar Shock looks great

description: MangoHud, the performance monitor you can put on top of games on Linux has a brand new release available with new features and fixes. This is the tech that powers the performance overlay on Steam Deck!
title: MangoHud performance monitor v0.7.2 out now

description: ChronoDojo blends together two genres that I didn't think would work. Putting together tower defense and a beat 'em up sounds a bit odd, but I've seen a lot stranger.
title: Co-op tower defense beat 'em up ChronoDojo adds various Steam Deck improvements

description: Cosmo Rider is a bhysics based roguelite bullet-hell-and-heaven horde-survivor action game. Upgrade your spaceship and traverse procedurally generated galaxies in this space survivors game.
title: Physics-based roguelite bullet-hell Cosmo Rider improves Steam Deck controls

description: Dear fans of Heroes of Might and Magic 2 and fheroes2 project supporters! The team is excited to present to you the release of version 1.1.0 - the second major release of the fheroes2 engine! This release features a significant update that we are thrilled to share with you.
title: Heroes of Might and Magic II game engine fheroes2 v1.1.0 released

description: Doing the rounds right now is a post from Valve's Steam support, when a user asked about what would happen to their Steam account when they died and it's not great news for anyone hoping to pass on your Steam account.
title: No leaving a Steam account in a will after you die according to Valve
